attributes.action: to sort delays in people recieving tax credits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Delays in tax credits shouldnt be happening as families need this money for their children,and to pay the bills that as we all no rising all the time.An application for tax credits should take a maximum of 14 days to process.I have been waiting 8 weeks, and still waiting.This shouldnt happen when we pay our tax without delay.
